author: rickhall
msg: Modifies bundle resource URL handling such that if a resource URL points
to a resource that does not exist, a bundle class path search for the
resource will be instigated and if any matching resource is found, that
one will be used instead. This partially addresses (FELIX-383), which is
concerned with constructing resource URLs from other resource URLs.

author: mcculls
msg: FELIX-390: upgrade to BND 0.0.203, and remove redundant getPackages method

author: jstrachan
msg: minor patch to timing issue in ibatis test case - also support pull based polling

author: remm
msg: - Propose fix for the JDT update.

author: clement
msg: Add static and dynamic-priority binding policy.
Manage super interfaces (interface extended by the implemented interfaces and by the super-class)
